text: is a private junior college in Matsuyama, Ehime, Japan. It was established in 1952, and is now attached to Matsuyama University. ==Departments== * Department of Commerce ==See also == * List of junior colleges in Japan ==External links== * Matsuyama Junior College Category:Private universities and colleges in Japan Category:Japanese junior colleges Category:Universities and colleges in Ehime Prefecture
title: Matsuyama Junior College
